law.catch_line: In addition to the powers set forth elsewhere in this title, the Board may:...

text.section:
In addition to the powers set forth elsewhere in this title, the Board may:
Adopt rules and regulations to carry out the provisions of this title; and
Take any action necessary to enable the State to meet applicable federal requirements.

In addition to the duties set forth elsewhere in this title, the Board shall:
Report directly to the Secretary, as the Secretary requires;
Adopt standards for:
Licensure of applicants; and
Practice of licensees;
Devise examinations and adopt investigative procedures to:
Determine whether licensees meet the standards adopted by the Board; and
Assure that licensees continue to meet these standards; and
Conduct a continuing study and investigation of nursing homes and nursing home administrators to improve:
Licensing standards; and
Procedures for enforcing these standards.
